Description: On I-95 at mile marker 140 in the County of Stafford, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right shoulder is closed.

Description: On Rt. 609 in the County of Henry, in the vicinity of Chestnut St; Rt. 684N/S (Henry County); Rt. 747N/S (Henry County), motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. All north lanes are closed. All south lanes are closed.
